svg.title: AI Coding CLI UX Comparison Grid
svg.desc: UX comparison grid for AI coding CLI tools showing user experience factors
svg.text: How each tool feels to use in real-world scenarios

g.text: • Claude CLI: Best onboarding & error messages, great for beginners
• Copilot CLI: Fastest responses, native GitHub experience
• OpenCode: Best privacy but slower due to local models
• Codex: Requires development skills, fastest for custom workflows
